<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AMDGPU target specific MCExpr operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Takes in a minimum of 1 argument to be used with an operation. The supported</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operations are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - (bitwise) or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   - max</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\note If the &#39;or&#39;/&#39;max&#39; operations are provided only a single argument, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operation will act as a no-op and simply resolve as the provided argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpumcexpr"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">AMDGPUMCExpr : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mctargetexpr/#a8ac1fdf776114a374cd8929fba6b8ccc">MCTargetExpr</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">AMDGPU &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tries to leverage KnownBits for MCExprs to reduce and limit any composed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MCExprs printing. E.g., for an expression such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ((unevaluatable&#95;sym | 1) &amp; 1) won&#39;t evaluate due to unevaluatable&#95;sym and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would verbosely print the full expression; however, KnownBits should deduce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the value to be 1 Particularly useful for AMDGPU metadata MCExprs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a2d69f7dd3e8c055a8aa9f8a6c401dc51">printAMDGPUMCExpr</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCExpr &#42;Expr, raw&#95;ostream &amp;OS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCAsmInfo &#42;MAI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCExpr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#aafd3b7d8deff060578db9e6e6529ef0a">foldAMDGPUMCExpr</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCExpr &#42;Expr, MCContext &amp;Ctx);</span></CodeLine>
